wikitext.*:
'''Värttinä''' is a Finnish folk music band founded by by Sari and Mari Kaasinen in 1983. They composed the music for ''[[The Lord of the Rings (musical)]]'', along with [[A.R. Rahman]] and [[Christopher Nightingale]].
